segments.text: You are late again , Maria . The teacher is about to come .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . I have to prepare the supper for the whole family before I leave .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , Ben has been cooking for us since I started attending this evening class . The good thing is , he has made great progress in cooking .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The housework is really a big problem for me . My husband is on a business trip to the U . S . now and I have to take care of everything myself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've asked my parents to live with us for a while , so they can look after her for me while I am at work or in the class .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How sweet of them ! I have to work in the day time , study at night , and do housework during my spare time . I really hope I have eight arms and legs , like an octopus .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Me too . Sometimes I do want to give it up . I can't deal with so many things at a time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When is your Adult College Entrance Exam ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's close coming up at the end of this month . That will be no more than 15 days from now on .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , my Adult College Entrance Exam is also around then . I don't know if I can pass it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why don't you take the CPA exam ? You are already a good accountant , having so many years of experience .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I just want to study in a college , majoring in economics . I've had this dream for a long time .
segments.speaker: S1
